content.title: Map the Login Operation
content.body:
1. From the Project explorer, expand Responsive Web / Desktop > Forms and select frmLogin.
  2. From the Data & Services panel, expand Project Services > UserAuthentication and select login.
  3. Drag the login operation on to the Login button of frmLogin on the canvas.
    It may take some time for Iris to add the service to your app.
  4. From the list of actions, select Action: onClick.
    The Action Editor window appears.
